name: Francis Searle
biography: Francis Searle (14 March 1909 â€“ 31 July 2002) was an English film director, writer and producer. He was active in the post-Second World War cinema industry. Amongst the films he directed were The Lady Craved Excitement (1950), One Way Out (1955) and It All Goes to Show (1969).Searle's later projects were all short films, either comedies or dramas, with his final film being made in 1972.
